file_content.text: See? What did I tell you? It's the captain from Rogun the Butcher's bounty posting. Are we lucky or what?
I never doubted you for a second, lover. You've always been my lucky star.
Ugh, you two make me sick. Hold it right there, Captain.
Is that a hairstyle, or did a womp rat die on your head?
I don't answer to morons.
Did you just... what... who do... shut up!
I'm not looking for any trouble.
This doesn't have to get ugly.
Too bad! It found you anyway. Now die like a good little bounty.
Let me guess. You're bounty hunters?
Looking for me?
You're not as dumb as you look, sweetheart.
Right the first time--give the man a death stick!
Come on, you two. Let's cremate this fool and get rich!
Your friends have so much to live for. Why get them killed?
But you're too young to die.
Ooh, tough talk from a scum on the run. I'm not afraid of you. I've got a flamethrower!
You kids run home to your mommas before I spank you.
Don't be stupid.
All right, that's it. Let's roast this stupid nerf-herder!
Hold it, Scorch. There's something about this captain. She might be more trouble than she's worth.
Ease off, Scorch. I have a bad feeling about this captain. He looks like more than we can handle.
Not man enough for a real challenge? Don't know what you see in this guy, Egara.
More than you could ever show me. Riloh, this bounty's worth more money than we earn in a month.
All right, lover--but stay behind me. I don't want you getting hurt over a lousy stack of credits.
If you want credits, I know a better way to earn them.
This is about money?
We're bounty hunters, stupid. This is what we do for a living.
Shut up, Scorch. Make your offer.
Ever heard of a starship thief named Skavak?
I'm looking for someone.
Mess with me and I guarantee you'll wind up dead.
Walk away and live.
You know what? I believe you. Let's get out of here.
Aw, come on! We can take this fool easy.
I'm starting to think Riloh's right. This job's too big for us. C'mon, Scorch.
I can't believe we're walking away from all those credits. You got lucky today, Captain.
Luck had nothing to do with it.
You're an idiot.
You go right on thinking that.
Run along, kid.
Feel free to take me on alone, if you want.
Leave or die.
This isn't fair, you guys. I was gonna buy a rocket launcher with this bounty....
My offer is that you find yourselves a new line of work.
Go get a real job.
Is that a joke? We'll see how funny you are on fire!
Listen to me. I'm not who you think I am.
You've got the wrong person.
Oh, please. That's what they all say!
I bet you've killed a lot of innocent people.
Then you're murderers.
I never flame-broiled anybody who didn't have it coming.
Except for that Rodian droid technician--and the Trandoshan cloth merchant.
And your last girlfriend. What was her name? Mira? Marzi?
It was Myrella, and that was an accident! You said this was the captain from Rogun the Butcher's bounty. Are you sure or not?
I don't know! I thought I was....
People always confuse me with wanted fugitives.
It's a common mistake.
Think you're slick, huh? The more I think about it, the more I'm sure I tagged you right. Shoot to kill, boys!
You wouldn't kill me on a hunch, would you?
But you're not sure.
Let's... let's get out of here. I think I made a mistake.
Aw, c'mon! I wanna fry somebody.
I hope you find the real bounty.
Keep looking.
You kids have a nice day.
Glad you saw reason.
Why'd you bring up Myrella in front of a total stranger? That was just cold....
There's plenty of people to fry on the lower levels.
Head for Black Sun territory.
Are you nuts? Those places are dangerous.
You don't know anything.
That bluff almost worked--but your sneer gave you away. Aim for the mouth, boys!
The real villain here is a man called Skavak.
Rogun made a mistake.
Never heard of him. You're just stalling.
Wait a minute. That name sounds familiar....
Skavak's worth more dead than alive, Riloh. Last time I checked his bounty, it was huge.
How huge?
Buy a starship and retire huge.
Skavak is somewhere here on Coruscant. Track him down.
So go find him.
Good tip. So, when we're done collecting on you, maybe we'll go after him, too.
I just saw Skavak in the Black Sun hideout.
I know where he is.
My cousin runs with Black Sun. He can get us in there. Forget this captain--save ammo for Skavak.
But the captain's right here! It's money in our pockets.
We get the drop on Skavak, we only need one shot. That's way better than fighting this captain.
Don't forget... shoot to kill.
Have fun, kids.
Aren't you even going to say "thank you"?
Where's the gratitude?
Besides, I'd just kill you.
Come on, Egara. We can do it!
I can't believe this. Wait up, you zero attention-span idiots!
In that case, I'll collect on him myself.
Whoa, really? [Attack]
Shoulda seen that coming.
I'm giving you one last chance to back off.
This will end badly for you.
All right, I'm officially bored. You'll be a lot more interesting when you're on fire.
You kids love to talk, huh?
We're done.
Let's play. [Attack]
Let's burn it up! Whooo!
